title: Rudie van Vuuren: Meet the 'Doc' who played at World Cups in two sports

title: Hartlepool man charged with murder by counter-terror police

title: Belgium v Sweden: Euro 2024 qualifier abandoned after Brussels shooting
description: Belgium's Euro 2024 qualifier against Sweden is abandoned at half-time for security reasons after two Swedish people are shot dead in Brussels.

description: Eight years of rule under the right-wing Law and Justice party could soon come to an end.

title: Andrew Bridgen: MP claims he was slapped on the head in Portcullis House

description: The Republic of Ireland get back to winning ways with a routine 4-0 victory against Gibraltar in Faro on Monday.

title: Ofcom online safety director suspended over anti-Israel posts

title: Same-sex hearing: The lesbian activist seeking marriage equality in India
